verses.verse: Now after <S%H310><s%> the death <S%H4194><s%> of Joshua <S%H3091><s%> it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> shall go <S%H5927><s%> up for us against the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> first, <S%H8462><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against them?
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Judah <S%H3063><s%> shall go <S%H5927><s%> up: behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have delivered <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> into his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> Come <S%H5927><s%> up with me into my lot, <S%H1486><s%> that we may fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites; <S%H3669><s%> and I likewise <S%H1571><s%> will go <S%H1980><s%> with you into your lot. <S%H1486><s%> So Simeon <S%H8095><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with him.

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%> into their hand: <S%H3027><s%> and they slew <S%H5221><s%> of them in Bezek <S%H966><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men. <S%H376><s%>

And they found <S%H4672><s%> Adonibezek <S%H137><s%> in Bezek: <S%H966><s%> and they fought <S%H3898><s%> against him, and they slew <S%H5221><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> and the Perizzites. <S%H6522><s%>

But Adonibezek <S%H137><s%> fled; <S%H5127><s%> and they pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him, and caught <S%H270><s%> him, and cut <S%H7112><s%> off his thumbs <S%H931><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and his great toes. <S%H931><s%> <S%H7272><s%>

And Adonibezek <S%H137><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Three score <S%H7657><s%> and ten kings, <S%H4428><s%> having their thumbs <S%H931><s%> <S%H3027><s%> and their great toes <S%H931><s%> <S%H7272><s%> cut <S%H7112><s%> off, gathered <S%H3950><s%> their meat under <S%H8478><s%> my table: <S%H7979><s%> as I have done, <S%H6213><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> God <S%H430><s%> has requited <S%H7999><s%> me. And they brought <S%H935><s%> him to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> he died. <S%H4191><s%>

Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> had fought <S%H3898><s%> against Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and had taken <S%H3920><s%> it, and smitten <S%H5221><s%> it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and set <S%H7971><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> on fire. <S%H784><s%>

And afterward <S%H310><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> that dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and in the south, <S%H5045><s%> and in the valley. <S%H8219><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Hebron: <S%H2275><s%> (now the name <S%H8034><s%> of Hebron <S%H2275><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kirjatharba: <S%H7153><s%>) and they slew <S%H5221><s%> Sheshai, <S%H8344><s%> and Ahiman, <S%H289><s%> and Talmai. <S%H8526><s%>

And from there <S%H8033><s%> he went <S%H3212><s%> against <S%H413><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Debir: <S%H1688><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of Debir <S%H1688><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Kirjathsepher: <S%H7158><s%>

And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> He that smites <S%H5221><s%> Kirjathsepher, <S%H7158><s%> and takes <S%H3920><s%> it, to him will I give <S%H5414><s%> Achsah <S%H5919><s%> my daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife. <S%H802><s%>

And Othniel <S%H6274><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kenaz, <S%H7073><s%> Caleb's <S%H3612><s%> younger <S%H6996><s%> brother, <S%H251><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> it: and he gave <S%H5414><s%> him Achsah <S%H5919><s%> his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to wife. <S%H802><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when she came <S%H935><s%> to him, that she moved <S%H5496><s%> him to ask <S%H7592><s%> of her father <S%H1><s%> a field: <S%H7704><s%> and she lighted <S%H6795><s%> from off <S%H5921><s%> her ass; <S%H2543><s%> and Caleb <S%H3612><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to her, What <S%H4100><s%> will you?

And she said <S%H559><s%> to him, Give <S%H3051><s%> me a blessing: <S%H1293><s%> for you have given <S%H5414><s%> me a south <S%H5045><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> me also springs <S%H1543><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%> And Caleb <S%H3612><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> her the upper <S%H5942><s%> springs <S%H1543><s%> and the nether <S%H8482><s%> springs. <S%H1543><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of the Kenite, <S%H7017><s%> Moses' <S%H4872><s%> father <S%H2859><s%> in law, <S%H2859><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up out of the city <S%H5892><s%> of palm <S%H8558><s%> trees with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which <S%H834><s%> lies in the south <S%H5045><s%> of Arad; <S%H6166><s%> and they went <S%H3212><s%> and dwelled <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H854><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And Judah <S%H3063><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> with Simeon <S%H8095><s%> his brother, <S%H251><s%> and they slew <S%H5221><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that inhabited <S%H3427><s%> Zephath, <S%H6857><s%> and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> it. And the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> Hormah. <S%H2767><s%>

Also Judah <S%H3063><s%> took <S%H3920><s%> Gaza <S%H5804><s%> with the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof, and Askelon <S%H831><s%> with the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof, and Ekron <S%H6138><s%> with the coast <S%H1366><s%> thereof.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with Judah; <S%H3063><s%> and he drove <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants of the mountain; <S%H2022><s%> but could not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the valley, <S%H6010><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they had chariots <S%H7393><s%> of iron. <S%H1270><s%>

And they gave <S%H5414><s%> Hebron <S%H2275><s%> to Caleb, <S%H3612><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> said: <S%H1696><s%> and he expelled <S%H3423><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> the three <S%H7969><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> of Anak. <S%H6061><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> did not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> that inhabited <S%H3427><s%> Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> but the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>
And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> they also <S%H1571><s%> went <S%H5927><s%> up against Bethel: <S%H1008><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with them.

And the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to descry <S%H8446><s%> Bethel. <S%H1008><s%> (Now the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> was Luz. <S%H3870><s%>)

And the spies <S%H8104><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> come <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the city, <S%H5892><s%> and they said <S%H559><s%> to him, Show <S%H7200><s%> us, we pray <S%H4994><s%> you, the entrance <S%H3996><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> and we will show <S%H6213><s%> you mercy. <S%H2617><s%>

And when he showed <S%H7200><s%> them the entrance <S%H3996><s%> into the city, <S%H5892><s%> they smote <S%H5221><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword; <S%H2719><s%> but they let go <S%H7971><s%> the man <S%H376><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his family. <S%H4940><s%>

And the man <S%H376><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Hittites, <S%H2850><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> a city, <S%H5892><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof Luz: <S%H3870><s%> which <S%H1931><s%> is the name <S%H8034><s%> thereof to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> did Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants of Bethshean <S%H1052><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Ibleam <S%H2991><s%> and her towns, <S%H1323><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and her towns: <S%H1323><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in that land. <S%H776><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Israel <S%H3478><s%> was strong, <S%H2388><s%> that they put <S%H7760><s%> the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> to tribute, <S%H4522><s%> and did not utterly drive <S%H3423><s%> them out.

Neither <S%H3808><s%> did Ephraim <S%H669><s%> drive <S%H3423><s%> out the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> that dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer; <S%H1507><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer <S%H1507><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them.

Neither <S%H3808><s%> did Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Kitron, <S%H7003><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Nahalol; <S%H5096><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> them, and became <S%H1961><s%> tributaries. <S%H4522><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> did Asher <S%H836><s%> drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Accho, <S%H5910><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> nor of Ahlab, <S%H303><s%> nor of Achzib, <S%H392><s%> nor of Helbah, <S%H2462><s%> nor of Aphik, <S%H663><s%> nor of Rehob: <S%H7340><s%>

But the Asherites <S%H843><s%> dwelled <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> for they did not drive <S%H3423><s%> them out.

Neither <S%H3808><s%> did Naphtali <S%H5321><s%> drive <S%H3423><s%> out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Bethshemesh, <S%H1053><s%> nor the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Bethanath; <S%H1043><s%> but he dwelled <S%H3427><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%> nevertheless the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Bethshemesh <S%H1053><s%> and of Bethanath <S%H1043><s%> became <S%H1961><s%> tributaries <S%H4522><s%> to them.

And the Amorites <S%H567><s%> forced <S%H3905><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%> into the mountain: <S%H2022><s%> for they would not suffer <S%H5414><s%> them to come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the valley: <S%H6010><s%>

But the Amorites <S%H567><s%> would <S%H2974><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Heres <S%H2776><s%> in Aijalon, <S%H357><s%> and in Shaalbim: <S%H8169><s%> yet the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> prevailed, <S%H3513><s%> so that they became <S%H1961><s%> tributaries. <S%H4522><s%>
And the coast <S%H1366><s%> of the Amorites <S%H567><s%> was from the going <S%H4608><s%> up to Akrabbim, <S%H6137><s%> from the rock, <S%H5553><s%> and upward. <S%H4605><s%>
